channel.title: Omfg!wtf do i do?!
channel.description: OMG!!!!!!wat i do i made testsacpe server i run it in;i made no-ip acc with servegame.com my ip adress is there;i got a ham network up;now wat do i do 2 make ppl play on my router???????i have another comp connected with the same router how i get it on my server???????????[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 11:29:33 PM[/size][hr]plz help me :( :( ill repay u in any way i can ill make u admin 4 free and other ppl u want too plz help me :([br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 11:31:21 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE im begging if any1 is ther PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Omfg!wtf do i do?!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

You should be able to find the Norton control panel by yourself. It might be located in the control panel folder of your computer, for example. Or in the Norton antivirus programs folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg!wtf do i do?!
item.dc:creator: @arlight1 arlight1
item.description:
@arlight1 wrote:

ok ty but in the firewall thing i have norton and idk where 2 go to stop the firewall[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 11:46:27 PM[/size][hr]ok i found the windows firewall and still didnt find the norton firewall…um…i put in 43594 and wat do put 4 the name and after that how do i turn off norton firewall[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 11:54:13 PM[/size][hr] wat do i do plz help

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg!wtf do i do?!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

This is not a chat window. You will get help from somebody if you wait.

First make sure you have your ports open

open ports in Windows Firewall and/or the firewalls offered by McAffee, Norton, or other full-system maintenance suites. For Windows Firewall, open its settings file in the control panel. Click on the "Exceptions Tab" and then click "Add Port." Add the following port: 43594. (If you'd rather not open a specific port or have to worry about Windows Firewall disabling access in any way, you can disable it entirely.)

And then set up your router

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Name: 1
IP address: 2
TCP Ports to open: 43594
UDP Ports to open:
Inbound Filter: Allow All
Schedule: Always

KEY
1 = Any name you want the server to be (I.E.MyScape).[/glow]
2 = The IP adddress of your COMPUTER; not the Internet.
Then save it. Ok now you can save settings after the rule is saved. Every router is different. Check with the manuals for yours to fully understand how to open the ports. If you cannot find/have a manuel, go to this address:

http://www.portforward.com/routers.htm

Please search for answers to your question before making a new topic as well as looking in the tutorials section.

Read full topic
